reviews.author: Rose
reviews.feedback: When I was asked to review a French Coffee Press, I wasn't sure if I should accept the offer because I had never used one. I have heard how much better coffee tastes when using a French Press & did some online research to learn the proper techniques so I accepted their review sample offer and made my first cup of French Press coffee.
